content: amigurumi pattern of a realistic crocheted anatomical model of a human breast this stuffed breast is projected for training moms on breastfeeding so it s an ideal gift for doulas midwifes obtetricians and lactation consultants it s also a cute soothing toy for new-borns and babies or for any boob-lover really details - skill level absolute beginner - pattern available in english us terms spanish spain terms italian - the finished amigurumi measures aprox 10 cm 4 inch worked with a 3 5 mm hook - no sewing involved 100% baby safe material needed 1 yarn ball for the nipple 1 yarn ball for the skin a 3 5 mm hook or the most fitting hook for your yarn stuffing tapestry needle and stitch marker
